sentences.text: The scientist who discovered talking plants wears rainbow glasses.
sentences.prompt: A female scientist in lab coat with vibrant rainbow-tinted glasses, amazed as potted plants form smiling faces. Botanical laboratory background with holographic screens, soft focus, Pixar animation style.

sentences.text: She shows us the leaf that glows in seven colours at night.
sentences.prompt: Close-up of a bioluminescent leaf emitting rainbow beams in darkness, held by gloved hands. Starry night sky visible through window, neon sap droplets, hyperrealistic macro photography with light trails.

sentences.text: We adopted the puppy that barks musical notes yesterday.
sentences.prompt: Golden retriever puppy sitting on porch, musical notes ♫ floating from its bark like cartoon bubbles. Adoption papers on table, sunset lighting, watercolor illustration.

sentences.text: Now it's chewing the shoes which play jazz when touched!
sentences.prompt: Comical scene: puppy gleefully chewing sneakers that emit glowing blue jazz notes ♬. Saxophone shapes form in air, splattered paint effects, 3D cartoon render.

sentences.text: Grandpa repaired the clock that stops time for five minutes.
sentences.prompt: Elderly man fixing antique clock with frozen cogs, entire room suspended in mid-air: floating teacup, paused butterfly. Steampunk workshop, cinematic golden hour lighting.

sentences.text: He uses it when the cat who steals socks makes mischief.
sentences.prompt: Mischievous calico cat frozen mid-jump with stolen polka-dot sock, dust motes hanging motionless. Grandpa winking at viewer, surreal photograph with tilt-shift effect.

sentences.text: My robot forgot the password that unlocks cloud storage.
sentences.prompt: Distressed vintage robot scratching head beside computer showing 'ACCESS DENIED', cloud icon flashing red. Metallic kitchen background, retro-futuristic design, cel-shaded animation.

sentences.text: So it's baking cookies which float to the moon instead!
sentences.prompt: Chocolate chip cookies floating upward from baking tray towards crescent moon, leaving caramel trails. Robot waving goodbye, starry night backdrop, whimsical gouache painting style.

sentences.text: We found the cave where fireflies that draw constellations live.
sentences.prompt: Magical cavern interior: fireflies arranging themselves into Orion shape on mossy walls. Glowing mushrooms, limestone formations, fantasy illustration with luminous effects.

sentences.text: It's hidden behind the waterfall that sings lullabies at dusk.
sentences.prompt: Twilight scene: majestic waterfall with musical notes ♪ swirling in mist, forming a natural curtain. Hidden cave entrance subtly visible, ethereal digital painting with cool blue tones.

sentences.text: The librarian lends books which change their endings magically.
sentences.prompt: Kind librarian pushing book cart, novels floating with shimmering rewritten text clouds. Ancient library setting, dust particles in sunbeams, magical realism oil painting.

sentences.text: She recommends the novel that makes readers glow while reading.
sentences.prompt: Teenager reading under oak tree, skin emitting soft golden light as letters rise from pages. Butterflies attracted to glow, bokeh background, anime-inspired composition.

sentences.text: Our soccer team needs the shoes that create speed trails.
sentences.prompt: Football boots emitting electric blue motion blur lines on locker room bench. Team jerseys hanging, chalkboard tactics diagram, dynamic sports photography.

sentences.text: Because we're playing against robots who calculate moves instantly!
sentences.prompt: Futuristic match: human striker with speed trails vs chrome goalkeeper robot projecting laser prediction grid. Neon stadium at night, sci-fi holographic effects, Unreal Engine render.

sentences.text: Mom hates the alarm clock which sprays water to wake people.
sentences.prompt: Comical bedroom scene: angry woman dodging water jet from cartoonish alarm clock with hose nozzle. Rumpled sheets, floating Zzz symbols, Pixar-style 3D animation.

sentences.text: She prefers sunrise lamps that mimic tropical beaches perfectly.
sentences.prompt: Serene morning: woman relaxing under lamp projecting palm tree shadows and ocean wave patterns. Floating coffee steam, sandy rug texture, warm photorealistic rendering.

sentences.text: The artist paints murals that come alive when rained on.
sentences.prompt: Street artist on scaffold finishing rainbow mural of dormant dolphins. Grey cloudy sky foreshadowing rain, urban alley setting, impressionist brushstrokes.

sentences.text: Today she's drawing dolphins who jump between buildings!
sentences.prompt: Rainy city scene: painted dolphins leaping across wet skyscrapers leaving water splashes. Umbrellas below reflecting animation, magical realism photograph with motion blur.

sentences.text: We ride the train that travels through dreams every Friday.
sentences.prompt: Vintage train floating through surreal landscape: pillow clouds, giant sleeping faces. Starry pajama-patterned sky, Dali-esque perspective, dreamy digital painting.

sentences.text: Last week we met the conductor who collects snores as souvenirs!
sentences.prompt: Jolly conductor in uniform catching floating Zzz symbols in butterfly net. Display case with labeled snore jars ('Grandpa's Bassoon Snores'), whimsical steampunk illustration.
